pages.text: In this ritual an $(thing)Endermite$() is tricked into spawning. The stone and dirt represent the surroundings, then an egg is thrown to simulate the use of an ender pearl. When the mite spawns, the summoned $(thing)Foliot$() immediately possesses it, visits $(thing)The End$(), and returns. The $(thing)Possessed Endermite$() will then drop $(item)End Stone$() when killed.
